question.ask: Questions 1~2  You are in a coffee shop but you don’t know which one to order. You ask the waiter two questions.

std.value: What is the best coffee in your shop? Could you give me some suggestions about the order?
std.ai: What is the best coffee in your shop? Could you give me some suggestions about the order?

std.value: What types of coffee are less bitter? Could you please recommend some coffee without too much caffeine?
std.ai: What types of coffee are less bitter? Could you please recommend some coffee without too much caffeine?

std.value: Which type of coffee is the best selling in your shop? Do you have any advice about the order?
std.ai: Which type of coffee is the best selling in your shop? Do you have any advice about the order?

question.keywords: what best coffee shop could give suggestions order|what types coffee less bitter could recommend coffee without caffeine|Which type coffee best selling shop have advice order

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your classmate is looking for his mobile phone. You offer to help and ask him two questions about his mobile phone.

std.value: Do you remember the last time you used it? What’s your phone number?
std.ai: Do you remember the last time you used it? What’s your phone number?

std.value: What’s your phone number? I will call it to make it ring. Have you left your mobile phone at home?
std.ai: What’s your phone number? I will call it to make it ring. Have you left your mobile phone at home?

std.value: Where did you last see your mobile phone? Do you remember the last time you used it?
std.ai: Where did you last see your mobile phone? Do you remember the last time you used it?

question.keywords: Do remember last time used What’s phone number|What’s phone number call make ring left mobile phone home|Where last see mobile phone remember last time used
